SEARCH
Package io.github.zhengzhengyiyi.tweak_api.api.configure

Class JsonConfigManager<T extends JsonConfigManager.ConfigSchema>

java.lang.Object
io.github.zhengzhengyiyi.tweak_api.api.configure.JsonConfigManager<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of configuration class, must implement ConfigSchema
public class JsonConfigManager<T extends JsonConfigManager.ConfigSchema> extends Object
Generic JSON configuration manager for mod settings. Handles loading, saving, and managing configuration options with change events.

Usage example: 


 JsonConfigManager<MyConfig> configManager = new JsonConfigManager<>("mymod", MyConfig.class);
 MyConfig options = configManager.loadConfig();
 
 // Register config change listener
 configManager.registerConfigChangeListener((newConfig) -> {
     System.out.println("Config changed: " + newConfig);
 });
 
 // Modify and save config
 configManager.saveConfig(options);
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • loadConfig

      public T loadConfig()
      Loads configuration from file, or creates default config if not exists. Automatically calls onConfigLoaded() after loading.
      Returns:
      the loaded configuration options

    • saveConfig

      public boolean saveConfig(T config)
      Saves configuration to file and triggers change events. Automatically calls onConfigSaving() before saving.
      Parameters:
      config - the configuration options to save
      Returns:
      true if saved successfully, false otherwise

    • isConfigModifiedExternally

      public static boolean isConfigModifiedExternally(Path configPath, long lastKnownModifyTime)
      Checks if the configuration file has been modified externally since last load. Useful for detecting manual edits to the JSON file.
      Returns:
      true if the file has been modified, false otherwise

    • reloadIfModifiedExternally

      public T reloadIfModifiedExternally(long lastKnownModifyTime)
      Reloads configuration if it has been modified externally.
      Returns:
      the reloaded configuration if modified, null otherwise

    • getConfigLastModifiedTime

      public long getConfigLastModifiedTime()
      Gets the last modification time of the config file.
      Returns:
      last modification time in milliseconds, 0 if file doesn't exist

    • registerConfigModificationCheck

      public static void registerConfigModificationCheck(JsonConfigManager<?> configManager, int checkIntervalTicks)
      Static utility method to register config file modification checking to server tick events. This will automatically reload configs when they are modified externally.
      Parameters:
      configManager - the configuration manager instance to monitor
      checkIntervalTicks - the interval in ticks to check for modifications (20 ticks = 1 second)

    • registerConfigModificationCheck

      public static void registerConfigModificationCheck(JsonConfigManager<?> configManager)
      Static utility method to register config file modification check with default interval (1 second).
      Parameters:
      configManager - the configuration manager instance to monitor

    • registerMultipleConfigModificationCheck

      public static void registerMultipleConfigModificationCheck(int checkIntervalTicks, JsonConfigManager<?>... configManagers)
      Static utility method to register multiple config managers for modification checking.
      Parameters:
      checkIntervalTicks - the interval in ticks to check for modifications
      configManagers - the configuration manager instances to monitor
